message.content: cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR. The paper discusses question generation, which is a task related to natural language processing and machine learning. The paper specifically focuses on improving the identification of answer-relevant context words in order to generate more accurate questions. This falls under the sub-categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.NE). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of information retrieval techniques, which falls under the sub-category of information retrieval (cs.IR).
